attributes.action: Petition to Create a UK Department of Government Efficiency (as Elon Musk)
attributes.additional_details: A DOGE would ensure taxpayer money is spent wisely by identifying waste, reducing unnecessary bureaucracy, and modernizing services. By adopting innovative practices, such as advanced tech and streamlined processes, the government can improve transparency, deliver better services, and build trust. This initiative would make the UK a leader in efficient governance, ensuring that every pound delivers maximum value for citizens while fostering innovation and responsiveness in public administration.
attributes.background: We ask the government to create a Department of Government Efficiency to reduce waste, streamline services, ensuring taxpayer money is spent effectively. By adopting innovative practices and technology, this department would modernize operations, cut bureaucracy, and improve public services for all.
